title: WL Martin Plan 24378
summary: Versatile builder spec with main level guest suite option. Currently being updated with new renders by Joshua.
description: Plan 24378 offers flexibility with a main-level bedroom suite that can serve as guest quarters or owner's retreat. The two-story design provides four bedrooms total with three full bathrooms. Currently receiving updated renderings to better showcase the layout and exterior options. This plan adapts well to various lot configurations and buyer preferences.
